Project Github

Bike Warehouse Project

Bike Warehouse is a webapplication designed for companies specialized in trading bikes. Users can browse bikes like in catalogue and also add own comments. Admin funcionality is much wider...
Guest functionality
  • Browsing bikes
  • Searching bikes
  • Sorting bikes - few kinds
  • Displaying user profiles
User functionality
  • Guest functionality
  • Adding comments to bikes
  • Removing own comments
Admin functionality
  • User functionality
  • Adding new bike
  • Editing existing bikes
  • Deleting bikes
  • Various supply summary
  • Searching users
  • Deleting users
  • Giving Admin authority to users

Below a video presenting application abilities...

... and the app code presentation

Diagram demonstrating simplified application workflow

MySQL database structure

Technologies used
Backend
  • Java 10
  • Spring 5 (Security, MVC, Core)
  • Hibernate 5 (CRUD, Validator)
  • Maven
  • MySQL
  • JavaScript
Frontend
  • HTML 5
  • CSS 3
  • Bootstrap 4
  • Font Awesome
  • Date Picker
  • FancyBox - pictures preview

Done: September 2018


Github

Campings Picker Project

Campings picker is an express application
Guest functionality
  • Browsing Campings
  • Searching Campings
  • Displaying Camp details with comments
User functionality
  • Guest functionality
  • Adding own Campings
  • Editing / Deleting own Campings
  • Adding comments to Campings
  • Editing / Deleting own comment
Admin functionality
  • User functionality
  • Full CRUD on all Campings
  • Full CRUD on all comments

Below a video presenting application abilities...

... and the app code presentation

MongoDB Models

Technologies used
Backend
  • Node.js
  • Express webapp framework (EJS)
  • MongoDB - moongose
  • Passport-local-moongose
  • Moment.js
  • JavaScript
Frontend
  • HTML 5
  • CSS 3
  • Bootstrap 3.3.7
  • Connect-flash - flash messages

Done: May 2018


Github

Guess the Number Game

Guess the Number Game is a multi module Spring Boot project, allowing to play in simple guessing number game on console and in the web browser. Player has 10 chances to guess the number between 0 and 100, after each guess special messages are generated.
Functionality
  • Console version
  • Browser version
  • 3 Language versions Polish, English, Spanish

Below a video presenting application abilities...

... and the app code presentation

Technologies used
Backend
  • Java 10
  • Spring 5 (MVC, Core)
  • Spring Boot 2
  • Maven
  • Thymeleaf 3
Frontend
  • HTML 5
  • CSS 3
  • Bootstrap 4

Done: June 2018
